title: Introducing Vox Quick Hits
description:
A daily playlist of bite-sized audio from Vox to start your day a little more informed. Tune in every weekday morning starting Tuesday, January 19th for episodes spanning politics, policy, and culture – all in 10 minutes or less.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:author: Vox
